insert into student_tr_member_card (member_id, open_member_id, member_card_id, member_card_no, member_card_name, member_card_type, member_card_expires, member_card_begin_time, member_card_end_time, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openMemberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{memberCardId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberCardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberCardType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberCardExpires,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberCardBeginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{memberCardEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
